closeDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the popover popup is closed when `openOnHover` is `true`.

defaultOpen.description:
Whether the popover is initially open.

To render a controlled popover, use the `open` prop instead.

delay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the popover popup is opened when `openOnHover` is `true`.

onOpenChange.description: Event handler called when the popover is opened or closed.

open.description: Whether the popover is currently open.

openOnHover.description: Whether the popover popup opens when the trigger is hovered after the provided `delay`.
